titles.title: He Is So Precious to Me

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: So precious is Jesus, my Savior, my King, His praise all the day long with rapture I sing; To Him in my weakness for strength I can cling, For He is so precious to me.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: For He is so precious to me, (so precious to me,) For He is so precious to me; (so precious to me;) 'Tis heaven below, my Redeemer to know, For He is so precious to me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: He stood at my heart's door in sunshine and rain And patiently waited an entrance to gain; What shame that so long He entreated in vain, For He is so precious to me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I stand on the mountain of blessing at last, No cloud in the heavens a shadow to cast; His smile is upon me, the valley is past, For He is so precious to me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I praise Him because He appointed a place Where, someday, through faith in His wonderful grace, I know I shall see Him, shall look on His face, For He is so precious to me.
